programme.title: Masti
programme.desc: Three henpecked friends tired of their respective marriage decide to spice up their lives by indulging in an extramarital affair. But things go downhill very quickly when they become the prime suspects in a deadly murder case.

programme.title: Raja Hindustani
programme.desc: A young taxi driver and a rich city girl fall head over heels in love with each other. Defying her family, she marries him and relocates to his village. But her family weaves a web of deception to split them apart.

programme.title: Thodi Thodi Si Manmaaniyan
programme.desc: An obedient middle-class boy battles between wanting to pursue a career in rock music and his mother's dream of studying abroad. In the midst of a dilemma he learns an unsettling truth about his dead father which nearly jeopardises his life.

programme.title: Baatein Kahi Ankahi
programme.desc: Watch Baatein Kahi Ankahi with RJ Anmol In An Exclusive Interview With Bollywood Stars.

programme.title: Charitra Heen
programme.desc: Rama and Indra are young and in love. However, Rama's stepmother opposes their betrothal and marries her off to an older drunkard for money. Meanwhile, Indra gets married too. Years later, Indra and Rama's paths cross again and Indra is left devastated to see Rama's distressed life. Will Indrajeet be able to help Rama or is it already too late?

programme.title: Abhimaan
programme.desc: Subir, a popular singer in show business, encourages his wife and a talented singer, Uma to take up singing as a career. However, his pride is wounded and their marital bliss is threatened when Uma's popularity surpasses his own.

programme.title: Haan... Maine Bhi Pyaar Kiya
programme.desc: Pooja, a recent divorcee, takes up a secretarial job where love blossoms between her and her boss. However, when her ex-husband returns to her life, she gets caught up in a dilemma of choosing a person she left behind and a person she is falling for.

programme.title: Rajkumar
programme.desc: Two warring kingdoms Thambore and Araavali decide to end their enmity by marrying their children. But post a fateful incidence the kingdoms revert to rivalry. Now Araavali prince's love for Thambore's princess is their only hope to end the rivalry.
